channel.title: Special Mission Changes after Recode
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Special Mission Changes after Recode"

item.title: Special Mission Changes after Recode
item.content:encoded:
(I hope this wasn't already suggested, because I didn't really had the time to check)
I see North has started to make mission changes. As you may know, after the recode, special missions (aka Quests, now) no longer cost 30 stamina. It varies with the number of parts of the mission.
I suggest to specify the total mission stamina cost.

Eddy.
